before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bra7k","text":"Starting specimens:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20l6k","text":"Starting samples = FFPE tissues cut to 4 micron thickness and adhered to positively-charged microscopy slides (e.g. SuperFrost Plus Slides; Fisher Scientific 12-550-15). It is crucial that tissues are adequately fixed to prevent tissue degradation but not over-fixed as to over-fragment RNA. Tissues no thicker than 0.5 centimeters should be freshly harvested and placed into 10% neutral-buffered formalin (NBF) or 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) at a ratio of at least 20 volumes fixative per one volume tissue. Tissues should be fixed for between 16-30 hours at room temperature (RT), followed by immediate transfer to 70% ethanol and processing into FFPE tissue blocks. Fixation times should be optimized for individual tissues and experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

creator.name: Jayne E Wiarda

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"94g7b","text":"A protocol for staining of protein (Ki-67) and RNA (MKI67) in pig tissues","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":52,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

forks.title: Dual staining for Ki67 protein and MKI67 transcript detection in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) pig tissues

creator.name: Jayne E Wiarda
creator.affiliation: National Animal Disease Center, ARS, USDA

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"93mpb","text":"Before starting the assay: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l4n","text":"Preheat a dry oven to 60℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9o6p0","text":"Load slides for assay into vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1clj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ovui","text":"Baking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8fbh","text":"Bake slides 30 min 60℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvr7t","text":"----------Optional stopping point: store slides in a dry place \u0026 use within 1 week","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":82}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n3te","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbg7u","text":"While slides bake:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9crf","text":"Prepare 0.05% PBS-T (can store at RT up to 1 month)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eudu9","text":"Prepare 1X Co-Detection Target Retrieval solution by adding 1 bottle (70 mL) Co-Detection Target Retrieval Reagent (10X stock concentration) to 630 mL distilled water (can store at 4℃ up to 1 month)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cj4jh","text":"Immediately before deparaffinizing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62rcu","text":"Add ~200 mL xylenes to each of two clearing agent dishes in a fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehoem","text":"Add ~200 mL 100% ethanol to each of two staining dishes in a fume hood\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vmb4","text":"Deparaffinizing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eucrh","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7njsb","text":"Submerge slide in fresh xylenes 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"398nm","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pd2s","text":"Submerge slides in fresh 100% ethanol 5 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgkak","text":"Air dry slides ~5 min or until completely dry","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4i64","text":"----------Optional stopping point: store slides in a dry place \u0026 use within 24 hours","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":84}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38a7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"369n5","text":"While slides deparaffinize:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cho6c","text":"Prepare decloaking chamber:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0e58","text":"o ----------Pour 500 mL distilled water into central chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h106","text":"o ----------Pour 200 mL distilled water into left/right staining dishes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmht1","text":"o ----------Pour 200 mL prepared Co-Detection Target Retrieval solution into middle staining dish","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfgme","text":"Turn off dry oven","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sbjm","text":"Prepare HybEZ Oven:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcmm4","text":"o  ----------Place humidifying paper within the humidity control tray \u0026 apply distilled water to fully wet paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50drf","text":"o  ----------Place humidifying tray into HybEZ oven and clamp down the gasket to seal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l8mo","text":"o  ----------Preheat oven to 40℃ for at least 30 minutes before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"g671","text":"Immediately before tissue quenching:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vocr","text":"Preheat the prepared decloaking chamber, programmed for 15 min at 95℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpjqv","text":"o ----------Chamber will take exactly 15 min to preheat, and there will be a 2 min window to add slides before chamber pressurizes \u0026 locks","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10nud","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg9l0","text":"Tissue Quenching","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"n6kn","text":"Unload slides from vertical slide rack and place on flat surface of bench top","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vvgp","text":"Incubate with Hydrogen Peroxide 10 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7rnu9","text":"o  ----------Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues; let incubate on bench top","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b3qp","text":"Decant slides and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c410i","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"co11o","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l89p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61ofv","text":"While slides incubate with Hydrogen Peroxide:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chnl4","text":"Discard deparaffinizing reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v0ki","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"70snc","text":"Target Retrieval","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehh1n","text":"Leave slides in water at RT until decloaker is preheated (\u003c5 min)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atv2","text":"Once decloaker has preheated, submerge slide rack in preheated distilled water 10 sec (left or right dishes in decloaker)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":53,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c20os","text":"Submerge slide rack in preheated 1X Co-detection Target Retrieval solution 15 min 95℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":62}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i5m5","text":"o  ----------Once slides are places in center staining dish of decloaker, close the decloaker (make sure pressure valve is in place to hold pressure when replacing lid) \u0026 wait for alarm to go off in 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s4gi","text":"Release decloaker chamber pressure valve \u0026 open chamber","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"caqq7","text":"Submerge slide rack in preheated distilled water 10 sec (left or right dishes in decloaker)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ofk2","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajvdp","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rbkt","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57ku7","text":"Leave slides in PBS-T","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tojn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9523h","text":"While slides incubate in 1X target retrieval solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v4vf","text":"Discard tissue quenching reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1cpo","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to each of two staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fioi","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to one staining dish","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cp33","text":"Prepare humidified slide staining tray by adding water to bottom \u0026 placing lid on top","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq8b6","text":"Add Ki-67 antibody to Co-Detection Antibody Diluent at a 1:100 dilution (2.5 ug/mL). Total volume to use is dependent on tissue sizes. Make sure to mix reagents before pipetting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rldr","text":"Hydrophobic Barrier","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crk36","text":"       Apply hydrophobic barrier around each tissue","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sq0d","text":"o  ----------One by one, unload slides from vertical rack submerged in PBS-T. Dry off only the area around the tissue where a barrier will be drawn with an immedge hydrophobic barrier pen. Keep tissue area wet the whole time. Draw barrier and place slide flat in the slide staining tray. Using a pipette, apply a small amount of PBS-T within the barrier (just enough to keep the tissue wet while drawing barriers on remaining slides)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vr4r","text":"Primary Antibody","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff4cs","text":"Decant slides and again place flat in slide staining tray","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83p4i","text":"Incubate with diluted primary antibody overnight 4℃; place lid back on slide staining tray during this time","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57r64","text":"Remove slides from slide staining tray, decant, and transfer to vertical slide rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ub5a","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dcit","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m2vk","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euvqr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i148","text":"While slides are incubating with primary antibody:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7917b","text":"Discard target retrieval reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22ar2","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of three staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e09m","text":"Add ~200 mL 10% NBF to one staining dish in a fume hood","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed8o6","text":"Antibody cross-linking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9iro5","text":"Submerge slide rack in 10% NBF 30 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drrv7","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clu1p","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ec0o","text":"Submerge slide rack in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhk7o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a99q7","text":"While slides are incubating with 10% NBF:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ncvs","text":"Discard primary antibody reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2mri","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to each of three staining dishes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1piia","text":"Prepare HybEZ Oven:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3is34","text":"o  ----------Place humidifying paper within the humidity control tray \u0026 apply distilled water to fully wet paper","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfdam","text":"o  ----------Place humidifying tray into HybEZ oven and clamp down the gasket to seal","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7f9g3","text":"o  ----------Preheat oven to 40℃ for at least 30 minutes before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2huqb","text":"Protease","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqv4t","text":"Transfer slides into EZ-Batch Slide Holder, taking care not to let tissues dry out","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2848","text":"Incubate with Protease Plus 15 min 40℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhtth","text":"o  ----------Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues \u0026 transfer slide holder to humidifying tray within HybEZ oven","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eef4n","text":"Remove slide holder from HybEZ oven/humidifying tray \u0026 decant (without removing slides from holder)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rgki","text":"Submerge slide holder in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gfu","text":"Submerge slide holder in fresh distilled water, dunking 3-5 times","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j19r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jq8s","text":"While slides are incubating with protease:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27mcb","text":"Empty the slide staining tray used for primary antibody incubations \u0026 put away","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6t2o","text":"Discard antibody cross-linking reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tfnv","text":"Add ~200 mL distilled water to each of two wash trays","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqo74","text":"Preheat RNAscope probes to 40℃ for 10 min before use; this can be done by placing them inside the HybEZ oven during protease incubation. Once preheated, add MKI67 probe undiluted on slides. Total volume to use is dependent on tissue sizes. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5uigc","text":"Probe Hybridization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n5fe","text":"Decant slides (without removing slides from holder)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rlou","text":"Incubate with appropriate RNAscope probe 2 hours 40℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":35,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2btgh","text":"o  ----------Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues \u0026 transfer slide holder to humidifying tray within HybEZ oven","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15r8f","text":"Remove slide holder from HybEZ oven/humidifying tray \u0026 decant (without removing slides from holder)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6rl3","text":"Submerge slide holder in fresh 1X wash buffer 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"infa","text":"Submerge slide holder in fresh 1X wash buffer 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h24e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79o0c","text":"While slides are incubating with probes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6a91","text":"Discard protease reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tcu7","text":"Prepare 1X wash buffer by adding 1 bottle (60 mL) Wash Buffer (10X stock concentration) to 2.94L distilled water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5ikp","text":"o  ----------If 10X Wash Buffer solution has a precipitant formed, preheat bottle at 37℃ for 1 hour before adding to distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sadg","text":"o  ----------Will have to prepare another batch of 1X wash buffer later in protocol, after first batch runs out. Alternatively, prepare both batches at once (120 mL 1X Wash Buffer + 5.88 L\ndistilled water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3518l","text":"o  ----------Store at RT up to one month","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g4uf","text":"Add ~200 mL 1X wash buffer to each of two wash trays","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qrfh","text":"Place AMPs from RNAscope Multiplex Fluorescent Detection kit at RT for at least 30 min before use (should be RT when used)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"adeki","text":"Immediately before protein detection:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hdf0","text":"Prepare diluted secondary antibody by diluting Alexa Fluor 488 F(ab’) fragment of goat anti-mouse IgG into Co-detection Antibody Diluent at a 1:1000 dilution. Total volume to use is dependent on tissue sizes. Make sure to mix reagents before pipetting. Store in the dark due to light sensitivity.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f960","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs51a","text":"Protein Detection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb79","text":"Decant slides (without removing slides from holder)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38ikc","text":"Incubate with diluted secondary antibody 1 hour RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30e7j","text":"o  ----------Invert bottle immediately before use; apply drops to completely cover tissues \u0026 transfer slide holder to humidifying tray on bench top","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv7q5","text":"Remove slide holder from humidifying tray \u0026 decant (without removing slides from holder)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ab4a","text":"Submerge slide holder in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24qa6","text":"Submerge slide holder in fresh PBS-T 2 min RT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24fe8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jsqj","text":"While slides are incubating with secondary antibody:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ed4h8","text":"Discard tissue blocking reagents ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48esd","text":"Add ~200 mL 1X wash buffer to each of two wash trays","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kun7","text":"Add ~200 mL PBS-T to one wash tray (if you only have two wash trays, complete this step after one PBS-T incubation after secondary antibody incubation)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dedn6","text":"Turn off HybEZ oven","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43gu7","text":"Nuclei Staining and Coverslipping","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aleg3","text":"One at a time, remove slides from slide holder and:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v26s","text":"o   ----------Apply DAPI 30 sec RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5g92s","text":"o   ----------Decant slide to remove DAPI","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apna","text":"o   ----------Mount slides by adding 2-4 drops of ProLong Gold antifade mounting media to each slide, followed by application of a cover glass. Remove bubbles from tissue by applying pressure to cover glass","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfach","text":"Place slides flat in a dry, dark space to air dry at RT 30 min","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcqjl","text":"Store at 4℃ and image within two weeks","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gv97","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ajm1","text":"While slides are air drying:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pkdt","text":"Discard protein detection reagents\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
